pages.text: Growthcraft Apiary extends the usage of Bees within the world. You can raise Growthcraft Bees in a bee box to produce honey comb that can then be harvested for its honey and make mead or convert the comb into bee's wax to make candles. While your bees are producing honey comb, there is a chance that they will pollinate the surrounding flowers.
Upon breaking a bee hive, a bee will fall to ground. Pick it up quickly before it escapes. Placing the bee into the Bee Box will start the processing.

Once you have a bee, you need to give them a Bee Box to produce Honey Comb. As long as there is a flower nearby, they will start producing empty honey comb and reproduce. The bees will pollinate the nearby flowers, making more flowers grow.
